title: API proxy development - Upwork
description: We're looking for an experienced developer to build an API proxy (RESTful API) for differentiating/isolating calls from different consumers to single main service. Expectations - built with .NET, using Ocelot or YARP - packed into docker image, - will be hosted in Azure Container App - secrets are stored in Azure KeyVault Proxy needs to - perform request authentication - caller will include certain API key in HTTP request headers - authorize caller for the actual route (single routing route is expected for now), for the authorized - modify json payload of the request - provide a field, specific to the actual caller (also stored in keyvault) - route the modified request to actual service - route response back Deliverables expected - source code on gitlab - code of proxy itself, docker compose fileSkills: Docker, API, HTTP, .NET Core

There is a primary sector and a secondary sector   - Look at each company name and click their website URL - Look at the company's website and read through their website to see what primary and secondary sector best suits them (we have provided some samples that you can use to ensure we are thinking the same) - Use the drop-down option to help you choose the most appropriate heading from the columns J and K - Double check with the company’s LinkedIn page when you are unclear and match accordingly -   Using publicly accessible information list the CEO and the CEO email address.  If our database is incorrect, update with the correct information. sample database attached. please review and attach to your reply and quotation The successful candidate will be sent the full 550 companiesSkills: Data Entry, Company Research, Data Mining, Microsoft Excel, Contact List, Data Scraping, Web Crawling

title: Virtual Assistant, Billing & Insurance Coordinator for a company in NYC - Upwork
description: Are you a detail-oriented individual with a passion for providing top-notch customer service in the healthcare industry? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you at our company in New York as a Virtual Assistant, Billing, & Insurance Coordinator. In this role, you will be responsible for setting up and reviewing auto payments for customers, managing billing and collections for customers with declined auto payments, processing insurance claims, and keeping patients informed about the status of their insurance claims through various communication channels. Additionally, you'll be handling virtual assistant tasks such as organizing, filing, providing customer support and HR assistance. To excel in this position, you must be highly organized, a quick learner when it comes to billing and insurance processes, adept at multitasking, possess a high IQ and EQ for problem-solving, enjoy working collaboratively in a team setting, have a genuine love for people, and be committed to delivering exceptional customer service. The ideal candidate will be available to work from 11AM to 6PM EST, display a strong work ethic, and be willing to go the extra mile to ensure tasks are completed accurately and in a timely manner. As a full-time employee, you will receive competitive hourly rates, along with the opportunity for sponsorship for a US visa and/or Green Card to live and work full-time in the vibrant city of New York. Full-time employee benefits include health insurance, dental insurance, vision insurance, 401k, paid time off, sick days, continuing education, and tuition reimbursement. If you're ready to join a dynamic team and make a difference in the lives of our customers, please submit your resume, cover letter, and a self-video introduction sharing your core values and how you plan to apply them to our team. Although this video is not required, it  will help your application stand out from the rest. Join us in our mission to provide exceptional healthcare services and create lasting positive impacts on our community. Apply today and embark on a rewarding career journey with us!Skills: Administrative Support, Customer Service, Email Communication, Virtual Assistance, Phone Communication

description: Hi There, Overview - Seeking a junior to senior level video project manager to manage pre-production through to delivery for 12 marketing & sales videos with international talent and crew. managing video production projects for marketing and sales (companies with $10M+ annual revenue) - 3+ years of video project management experience - experience hiring/ ending contracts on Upwork - 90% or higher Upwork rating with more than $1K earned Manager’s Key Qualities - Fluent or native English speaker - Relevant experience (familiar with all stages of video production) - Successful track record with similar metrics - Team leader - Problem solver who can work autonomously - Collaborative when needed (especially with other department managers) Manager’s Responsibilities - Hiring crew outside Upwork - Hiring spokesperson with talent agency - Securing locations - Scheduling talent, crew and locations - Managing wardrobe, hair and make up - Emailing suppliers - Coordinating clear communication between all team members - Getting NDA’s signed - Manage budget - Hire/ end contracts with freelancers on UW - Managing file uploads, downloads and transfers - Other video production related tasks Manager’s Skills - Fluent or native English speaker - Communication - Leadership - Team management - Negotiation - Critical thinking - Planning & sequencing - Risk management - Time management - Budget management - Maintain updates/ communication - Identify/ manage risks - Monitor/ control team performance - Present reports documenting steps Manager’s Availability - Live/ work in EU time zone - Can manage people in US time zone - Available daily Monday-Saturday - Available 5-8 hr a day for first ten days (pre-production/ shooting) - Available to respond quickly at different hours - No major foreseen availability issues over the next 3-4 weeks (Ex: moving houses, moving countries, moving offices, taking intensive course, etc) - Must work from a fixed office. No digital nomads. If you meet all or most of the above criteria, please let me know your availability for a 10 min zoom meeting this afternoon CET. Regards, KitSkills: Digital Project Management, Team Management, Media & Entertainment, Video Production, Marketing Video

title: Expert DevOps Engineer/Architect - Kubernetes | Terraform  | EKS - Upwork
description: I’m looking for an experienced DevOps engineer with a strong background in Kubernetes, Terraform, and Amazon EKS to optimize and implement a robust deployment on Zadara's cloud storage solutions. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of managing complex cloud infrastructure and automating deployment processes. Project Details: Objective: Optimize and test a Terraform template for deploying Kubernetes on Zadara Private Cloud, ensuring a streamlined, automated installation process. Terraform deployment - https://github.com/zadarastorage/zadara-examples/tree/main/k8s/eksd/docs Scope: - Review and optimize an existing Terraform template designed for deploying and maintaining EKS-D on Zadara. The template includes core components, basic plugins, CSI components, etc’ - Install and configure the Otomi Paas on top of the EKS-D solution, turning the Kubernetes cluster into a fully-fledged DevOps platform. Otomi deployment - https://github.com/redkubes/otomi-core https://otomi.io/docs/get-started/installation/aws End Goal: Deliver a scalable, efficient, and easily reproducible solution that can be deployed across different new accounts and projects with minimal manual intervention. Responsibilities: - Conduct a thorough review of the existing Terraform template and infrastructure setup. - Propose and implement optimizations for the Terraform scripts to enhance automation and reliability - Deploy and configure the EKS-D solution on Zadara's infrastructure as per the provided guidelines. - Install and integrate the Otomi platform with the Kubernetes cluster. - Ensure the entire solution is documented for easy replication across different environments. - Provide a final report detailing the implementation, along with recommendations for maintenance and future enhancements. Requirements: - Proven experience with Kubernetes, Terraform, and Amazon EKS. - Experience in deploying and managing DevSecOps tools, specifically Otomi, is a plus. - Proven experience in Kubernetes architecture design How to Apply: - A brief overview of your experience with similar projects. - Your approach to optimizing and implementing the described solution. - An estimated timeline and budget breakdown. Without these details, your proposal will not be reviewed. ThanksSkills: Amazon Web Services, Kubernetes, DevOps, Terraform, Deployment Automation

title: Website Design and Development - Upwork
description: We are logistics company that offers custom clearance service in Nigeria. We are looking to hire a skilled WordPress developer to design and implement attractive and functional websites for our clients. You will be responsible for both back-end and front-end development including the implementation of WordPress themes and plugins as well as site integration and security updates. To be a successful WordPress developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of front-end programming languages, a good eye for aesthetics, and strong content management skills. Ultimately, a top-class WordPress developer can create attractive, user-friendly websites that perfectly meet the design and functionality specifications of the client. WordPress Developer Responsibilities: Meeting with clients to discuss website design and function. Designing and building the website front-end. Creating the website architecture. Designing and managing the website back-end including database and server integration. Generating WordPress themes and plugins. Conducting website performance tests. Troubleshooting content issues. Conducting WordPress training with the client. Monitoring the performance of the live website. WordPress Developer Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a similar field. Proven work experience as a WordPress developer. Knowledge of front-end technologies including CSS3, JavaScript, HTML5, and jQuery. Knowledge of code versioning tools including Git, Mercurial, and SVN. Experience working with debugging tools such as Chrome Inspector and Firebug. Good understanding of website architecture and aesthetics. Ability to manage projects. Good communication skills. We are looking for a Brand Designer & Illustrator. In this role, you will be responsible for developing visual concepts and designs that align with our brand’s identity and meet the needs of our clients and marketing teams. You will create artwork, such as logos, packaging, and promotional materials, using computer software or by hand. If you are a creative and detail-oriented individual with experience in brand design and illustration, we encourage you to apply for this position. Responsibilities Researching current design trends and staying up-to-date on new technologies and techniques Presenting design concepts to clients and stakeholders for review and feedback Making revisions and adjustments to designs based on feedback Managing multiple design projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines Ensuring that all designs are produced to the highest standards of quality and accuracy Providing support and guidance to junior designers or assistants on the team Participating in team meetings and providing input on design-related topics and projects Requirements and skills Minimum 2-3 years of experience in a brand design or illustration role Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite or other graphic design software Strong portfolio showcasing a range of design and illustration styles and techniques Excellent attention to detail and ability to produce high-quality work Strong communication and collaboration skills Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously Creative problem-solving skills and ability to think outside the box Flexibility and willingness to adapt to changing design needs and priorities Strong time management skills and ability to meet deadlines Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design or a related field is preferred, but not requiredSkills: Web Design, WordPress, Web Development, Graphic Design, HTML, CSS, Adobe Photoshop, Mockup, Visual Communication, Wireframing

title: CIO- Lead Software Engineer - Upwork
description: Description:  Our fast-growing Edtech company provides K12 schools with systems that better track and improve student attendance, we love our work because we truly believe we are making a difference in the many communities we serve.  Our company strives for constant improvement in our products and our performance.    We utilize desktop software and mobile apps that connect to a centralized SAAS backend SQL server database.   This database shares data with over 400 client systems through SFTP imports/exports and direct API’s. Duties:  After many years at the helm, our current Chief Programmer will be leaving our organization.  We are looking for a key addition to our team to replace him.   You will supervise a team of 3 and be in charge of all backend and front end SAAS operations.   Keeping our system running and troubleshooting specific client issues Monday through Friday. You are a technology rock star, a technical switchblade with full stack knowledge.  Education Industry experience a plus.   Powerschool, etc…. You are Captain Kirk, Mr. Spock, and Scottie rolled into one.    There is nothing you can’t figure out and a good day for you is when you have to do very little to keep the system humming along and performing for our clients.   You will cross-train and groom your team.  Putting in place development guidelines and product rollout strategies as well as performance monitors that alert the team of system anomalies.     You will bring this company to the next level of its growth and be rewarded with a percentage of the recurring revenue after 2 years. HOURS:   40 hours, start time 6am EST, AFTER HOURS AS EMERGENCIES ARISE Skills required: 1. Must be proficient with Microsoft SQL server, including creating tables and fields, creating SSIS packages, writing stored procedures, and writing optimized queries 2. HTML (with HTML5 experience), CSS, jQuery/Bootstrap, and JSON 3. ASP.NET, C#, Typescript, Angular, Reacts, .Net Core 3/5/6 4. Experience with GitLab/GitHub/Bitbucket or other DVCS 5. Experience with building and integrating REST APIs 6. Experience with Building IOS and Android Apps 7. Experience with KendoUI jQuery toolkit. 8. Experience using MongoDB or other document database. 9. Experience with event driven architectures 10. Understanding of open source projects ServiceStack, Mass Transit 11. Experience with Golang 12. Experience writing WPF applicationsSkills: Microsoft SQL Server, React, .NET Framework, AngularJS, Web Development, API, SaaS Development

title: UX/UI Expert Figma Designer to build user portal design for music school - Upwork
description: We are looking to design a user portal for a music school in Figma. We are looking for a catching design tailored to music students, parents, teachers and admins. I have attached a bland idea of what we are looking for just to give you an idea- but please use imagination and create something that doesn't look the same. We really like the aesthetic that Nike gives in their work. If we can include similar features to what Nike is doing that would be great. We are looking for someone to create every page possible that might come up when navigating through this portal with the same branding throughout. The portal will do the following: (These are the instructions for the programmer just to give you some insight on what this whole thing will do) 1. User Management and Portal Login Separate Portals: Create distinct login portals for teachers, students, employees, and parents. Each portal should have role-specific access control to ensure users only access relevant information and functionalities. Registration and Authentication: Implement a secure registration and authentication system for all user types. 2. Communication Portal (think of Slack or Discord when doing this design) Integrated Messaging System (IMS): This will serve as the communication backbone, allowing teachers, students, parents, and employees to interact within their portals. The IMS can include features like direct messaging, announcements, and forums. 3. Content Management System (CMS) Program Information: Develop a CMS to update and manage content related to the music program, including course descriptions, teacher bios, and event announcements. This should be accessible through the main website to attract potential students. 4. Lesson Scheduling and Management Dynamic Lesson Structure: Implement a flexible data table structure to accommodate lesson scheduling for different age groups (K-3rd grade, 3-7th grade, 7th grade and above) with varying requirements. Rotation and Scheduling Logic: For K-3rd grade, ensure class rotation to avoid missing the same class. For 3-7th grade, adjust the school schedule around music lessons. For 7th grade and above, offer classes at any time, adapting to student availability. Three Iterations of Scheduling: Develop scheduling iterations for during school, after school, and weekends, allowing for comprehensive planning. Studio-Based Management: Organize schedules and data based on studios rather than individual instructors to centralize information and facilitate easier management. 5. Registration and Enrollment Pre-Registration Announcements: Implement a system for sending out pre-registration announcements to gauge interest in various classes. Database Management: Capture registration information in a database, filtering by timing and demand to assist in reverse teacher assignment based on class needs. 6. Attendance and Lesson Overview Attendance Tracking: Enable teachers to mark attendance digitally, with a feature to input a brief overview of each class's content. 7. Invoicing and Commission Calculation Centralized Invoicing: Shift invoicing responsibilities from teachers to the school, with the ERP generating invoices based on a commission calculation system. Automated Invoice Distribution: Set up an automated process for invoice distribution directly from the school's server to parents. 8. Booking System Instrument and Time Slot Selection: Allow parents and students to sign up for lessons by selecting an instrument and a preferred time slot, with the managers assigning teachers based on availability and expertise. 9. Inventory Management K-3 Class Pickup System: Implement an inventory management system to track which K-3 students need to be picked up from their previous class by their music teacher, ensuring smooth transitions between classes. 10. Ai Implementation Implement Ai and Automations wherever possible. Database in which Ai is trained off of that helps teachers and staff with emails, schedules, course content etc.. Please send me your portfolio of past works. We are looking to get started on this as soon as possible.Skills: Wireframing, Sketch, Web Design, Responsive Design, Prototyping, User Interface Design

title: [Pakistan] Full Time Shopify Front End Developer (Paid Training if JS Skills Are Great) - Upwork
description: Looking for a full time shopify front end developer (if you don't have exp. its okay we can do paid training but you must have core programming concepts and good javascript skills). Hi there! We are Muscled Digital Agency, a top rated plus Upwork agency that serve mainly USA and Canadian clients. You'll be working alongside a talented team of 15 designers and developers from mainly Pakistan! The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and debugging responsive web and mobile applications for the company. Using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, this candidate will be able to translate user and business needs into functional frontend design. The salary will be 30k PKR per month, working nightshit in Pakistan Monday - Saturday from 6 pm - 4 am, which translates to 8 am - 6 pm EST. You will also get bonuses worth up to between 50k - 100k in your first year if you do a good job. We are looking for hustlers who are passionate about coding and learning tech. *You cannot be a currently enrolled student. Must have graduated* Responsibilities Build custom sections on Shopify using Liquid, html/css/js Use AJAX Api on Shopify to create sections and functionalities Must be familiar with using Shopify APIs Must be able to convert Figma designs to pixel perfect code Must have a strong grasp of Javascript Qualifications Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science 2+ years' experience in frontend development Experience with custom sections using Liquid, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3Skills: Shopify, JavaScript, Liquid

title: Full-stack Developer - Microservices - Upwork
description: Responsibilities: - Design and develop highly scalable, resilient, and efficient microservices. - Work independently or in teams to integrate microservices with both front-end and back-end systems. - Ensure the highest level of performance and security in all microservices. - Collaborate with the team to map out and execute new features and enhancements. - Conduct code reviews and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability. - Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance optimization. - Implement automated testing platforms and unit tests. - Participate in the design and creation of scalable software. - Write technical documentation for the developed services and APIs. - Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technologies to incorporate into operations and practices. Requirements: - Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role, with a focus on microservices architecture. - Experience with most of the following; typescript, mongodb, redis, fastify, docker, kubernetes/k8s, git, sentry, chalk, express, react, eslint, jest, typedoc, cloud services, api design and microservices - Other relevant experiences, projects or degree -- you need to have something to show us Nice-to-Haves: - A knack for benchmarking and optimization. - Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to take on challenging tasks.Skills: Redis, Docker, TypeScript, Node.js, MongoDB, React, Fastify, Quality Assurance, Documentation Testing

title: Electrical Engineering Assignment - Upwork
description: please solve all using all steps. Problem 2. Simulate the system using the PWM Generator block. Configure the block to use “Carrier Counter” “Up-Down”, which corresponds to triangular carrier. Use fsw = 40 kHz. Apply the duty-cycles calculated in 1d). Produce two sets of simulation results; first, use bipolar modulation, second use unipolar modulation. Hint: for bipolar modulation, produce the gating signals g1 and g¯1 using the PWM Generator block and use the signal g¯1 to drive g2. Use g¯2 = g1. Hint: for unipolar modulation, produce the separate set of gating signals, g2 and g¯2, with another PWM Generator block with identical phase delay (e.g., 0 s). a) Does the system draw the expected current? Explain any discrepancies. b) Plot iac in both the time and frequency domains for each one of the simulations. c) Compute the THD for each one of the two simulations. d) Comment on the differences iac profiles observed with unipolar and bipolar modulations.Skills: Electrical Engineering, Circuit Design, Electronics, MATLAB, Engineering Simulation, Electronic Design
